channel.title: How i can set xp for skills
channel.description:
like exemple i want in 10 clicks to get 99 str...EXEMPLE. Someone help me please or has a tut for it.
thank you!

item.title: How i can set xp for skills
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:6, topic:136557”]Ahaha Unid, that belongs in your chemicalscape forums sig.
Go into client.java and search

case 823:

And edit that up
This’ll help you major time: (written by me!)

0 - Attack 1 - Def 2 - Str 3 - HP 4 - Range 5 - Pray 6 - Mage 7 - Cook 8 - WoodCut 9 - Fletch 10 - Fish 11 - Fm 12 - Craft 13 - Smithing 14 - Mining 15 - Herb 16 - Agility 17 - Theif 18 - Slayer 19 - Farming 20 - RC 21+ - Added Skills, such as summon, and con.[/quote]thanks i will

Read full topic
